786160.name: Ladybird Reflect - Bonus Pack
786160.description:
Bonus levels

The Ladybird Reflect Bonus Pack adds 10 new challenging levels to the game. Once the DLC has been installed the bonus levels can be played by using the button in the main menu called "Bonus".
If you enjoyed the game these levels will definitely extend your fun and are an easy way to thank the creators.

Soundtrack

The soundtrack of this game is included as well. Listen to the hits by DJ Licehunter and MC Spiderbadger!


Track list:
1. Ladybird Life - DJ Licehunter
2. Babybirds - MC Spiderbadger

Note: The soundtrack will be downloadable as MP3 files within the DLC and will be located in the same directory as the game files. To listen to it, open the music section and play the album Ladybird Reflect OST or (to access the music files) right-click Ladybird Reflect in your Steam library and select "Properties". Then select the "Local Files" tab and click the "Browse Local Files" button.
786160.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
